channel.title: MariaDB Quickstart on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in MariaDB Quickstart on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes

item.title: MariaDB Quickstart
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. MariaDB QuickStart This tutorial will show you how to use KubeDB to run a MariaDB database. Note: The yaml files used in this tutorial are stored in here. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster. If you do not already have a cluster, you can create one by using kind.
